titles.title: To approve the transfer of Yellow Creek Port properties in Iuka, Mississippi.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.
Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 113-553.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 413.

bill.summary: 8/2/2013--Introduced. Approves the conveyance by the Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA) to the state of Mississippi of the federally-owned Yellow Creek Port properties in the custody of the TVA at Iuka, Mississippi.
